publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2416Nigel Don:Poetry in a Motion—That the Parliament congratulates Wayne Price of the University of Aberdeen on receiving the second-place prize in the inaugural Edwin Morgan International Poetry Competition; further congratulates Eddie Gibbons of Aberdeen who was awarded a runner-up prize, and hopes that their success will stimulate other creative writers in the north east to enter the competition in future years.
S3M-2416 Poetry in a Motion (lodged on 21 August 2008) Michael Matheson*
S3M-2416 Poetry in a Motion (lodged on 21 August 2008) Aileen Campbell*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Wilson*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*, Robin Harper*
S3M-2416 Poetry in a Motion (lodged on 21 August 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-2416 Poetry in a Motion (lodged on 21 August 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-2416 Poetry in a Motion (lodged on 21 August 2008) Brian Adam*
S3M-2416 Poetry in a Motion (lodged on 21 August 2008) Angela Constance*
